name: Anchorhead
description: You take a deep breath of salty air as the first raindrops begin to spatter the pavement, and the swollen, slate-colored clouds that blanket the sky mutter ominous portents amongst themselves over the little coastal town of Anchorhead.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 150 MB available space
